typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		{Submission Date} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,
		{BSO ownership} as string,
		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,
		Twitter as string,
		LinkedIn as string,
		{Date of birth2} as string,
		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Title as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		Location as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		{Account Name} as string,
		{English Name} as string,
		Acronym as string,
		{Account Type} as string,
		{Account Sub-Type} as string,
		{Office Address: Country} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Parent Account} as string,
		Confidential as string,
		Activity as string,
		Product as string,
		{Women Managed} as string,
		{Youth Managed} as string,
		{Social media} as string,
		{Other emails} as string,
		{Other phone numbers} as string,
		{Other information} as string,
		{Ownership and management} as string,
		{Trade Forum} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Office Address: City} as string,
		{Office Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing address is equal to office address} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Mailing Address: City} as string,
		{Mailing Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Country} as string,
		{UN Mailing Format} as string,
		{Project Number} as string,
		Salutation as string,
		Account as string,
		Phone as string,
		{Preferred Language} as string,
		{Use account address} as string,
		{Event title} as string,
		{Event type} as string,
		{Course name} as string,
		{Start date} as string,
		{End date} as string,
		{Event date} as string,
		{SME Trade Academy} as string,
		SheTrades as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcAll
source(output(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		YAHOO as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM
source(output(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		YAHOO as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExistingDIM1
source(output(
		MAX_VAL as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select IsNULL(Max(PARTICIPANT_ID),0) MAX_VAL\nFROM MART_OWNER.DIM_PARTICIPANT',
	format: 'query') ~> ExistingDimMAX
SrcAll select(mapColumn(
		Email,
		{Phone number},
		{Last name},
		{Middle name},
		{First name},
		Gender,
		{Year of birth},
		{Date of birth},
		{Job title},
		{Professional status},
		{Office Address},
		City,
		{Post Code},
		{Date of birth2},
		Nationality,
		Address,
		Cityname,
		id,
		Username,
		Title,
		Functional_title,
		Howlong,
		Priorexperience,
		Pobox,
		Postalcode,
		Skype,
		Aim,
		Yahoo,
		Msn,
		Cityregion,
		Uniqueid,
		User_id,
		Confidential,
		{Social media},
		{Other emails},
		{Other phone numbers},
		{Other information},
		{Office Address: Street 1},
		{Office Address: Street 2},
		{Office Address: City},
		Salutation,
		Phone,
		{Preferred Language},
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqColumns
SelectReqColumns derive(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID = case(isNull(Email)==false(),
     Email,
     concat({First name}, {Last name},Gender,{Year of birth})
     ),
		EMAIL = Email,
		LAST_NAME = {Last name},
		MIDDLE_NAME = {Middle name},
		FIRST_NAME = {First name},
		GENDER = Gender,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH = {Year of birth},
		NATIONALITY = Nationality,
		JOB_TITLE = case(isNull({Job title})==false(),
     {Job title},
     isNull(Functional_title)==false(),
     Functional_title,
     ''),
		ADDRESS = iif({Professional status}=='Self-employed/ freelancer', 
    case(isNull(Address)==false(),
            Address,
         isNull({Office Address})==false(),
            {Office Address},
         isNull({Office Address: Street 1})==false(),
            {Office Address: Street 1},
         ''),
    ''),
		ID = case(isNull(id)==false(),
    id,
    isNull(Uniqueid)==false(),
    Uniqueid,
    ''),
		USERNAME = case(isNull(Username)==false(),
    Username,
    isNull(User_id)==false(),
    User_id,
    ''),
		HOWLONG = Howlong,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE = Priorexperience,
		SALUTATION = case(isNull(Title)==false(),
    Title,
    isNull(Salutation)==false(),
    Salutation,
    ''),
		CITY_NAME = case(isNull(City)==false(),
    City,
    isNull(Cityname)==false(),
    Cityname,
        isNull({Office Address: City})==false(),
    {Office Address: City},
    ''),
		POBOX = case(isNull(Pobox)==false(),
    Pobox,
    isNull({Office Address: Street 2})==false(),
    {Office Address: Street 2},
    ''),
		POST_CODE = case(isNull({Post Code})==false(),
    {Post Code},
    isNull(Postalcode)==false(),
    Postalcode,
    ''),
		SKYPE = Skype,
		AIM = Aim,
		YAHOO = Yahoo,
		MSN = Msn,
		SOURCE = FILE_NAME,
		CITY_REGION = Cityregion,
		OTHER_INFORMATION = {Other information},
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS = {Other phone numbers},
		OTHER_EMAILS = {Other emails},
		SOCIAL_MEDIA = {Social media},
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE = {Preferred Language},
		CONFIDENTIAL = Confidential,
		{PHONE NUMBER} = Phone) ~> DerivedDIMCol
DerivedDIMCol select(mapColumn(
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP,
		UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID,
		EMAIL = DerivedDIMCol@EMAIL,
		LAST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		GENDER = DerivedDIMCol@GENDER,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
		NATIONALITY = DerivedDIMCol@NATIONALITY,
		JOB_TITLE,
		ADDRESS = DerivedDIMCol@ADDRESS,
		ID = DerivedDIMCol@ID,
		USERNAME = DerivedDIMCol@USERNAME,
		HOWLONG = DerivedDIMCol@HOWLONG,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
		SALUTATION = DerivedDIMCol@SALUTATION,
		CITY_NAME,
		POBOX = DerivedDIMCol@POBOX,
		POST_CODE,
		SKYPE = DerivedDIMCol@SKYPE,
		AIM = DerivedDIMCol@AIM,
		MSN = DerivedDIMCol@MSN,
		SOURCE,
		CITY_REGION,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE,
		CONFIDENTIAL = DerivedDIMCol@CONFIDENTIAL,
		{PHONE NUMBER} = DerivedDIMCol@{PHONE NUMBER},
		YAHOO = DerivedDIMCol@YAHOO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDIMCol
SelectDIMCol aggregate(groupBy(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID),
	each(match(name!='UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID'), $$ = last($$))) ~> AggDistinct
AggDistinct derive(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD = sha2(256,EMAIL,
LAST_NAME,
MIDDLE_NAME,
FIRST_NAME,
GENDER,
YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
NATIONALITY,
JOB_TITLE,
ADDRESS,
ID,
USERNAME,
HOWLONG,
PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
SALUTATION,
CITY_NAME,
POBOX,
POST_CODE,
SKYPE,
AIM,
YAHOO,
MSN,
SOURCE,
CITY_REGION,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_EMAILS,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
PREFERRED_LANGUAGE,
CONFIDENTIAL,
{PHONE NUMBER})) ~> SourceHASHRecords
ExistingDIM1 aggregate(groupBy(PARTICIPANT_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestRecord
ExistingDIM, LatestRecord join(ExistingDIM@PARTICIPANT_ID == LatestRecord@PARTICIPANT_ID
	&& ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO == LatestRecord@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(EXISTING_RECORD_HASH = sha2(256,EMAIL,
LAST_NAME,
MIDDLE_NAME,
FIRST_NAME,
GENDER,
YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
NATIONALITY,
JOB_TITLE,
ADDRESS,
ID,
USERNAME,
HOWLONG,
PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
SALUTATION,
CITY_NAME,
POBOX,
POST_CODE,
SKYPE,
AIM,
YAHOO,
MSN,
SOURCE,
CITY_REGION,
OTHER_INFORMATION,
OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
OTHER_EMAILS,
SOCIAL_MEDIA,
PREFERRED_LANGUAGE,
CONFIDENTIAL,
PHONE_NUMBER),
		EXISTING_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID = case(isNull(EMAIL)==false(),
     EMAIL,
     concat(FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME,GENDER,toString(YEAR_OF_BIRTH))
     )) ~> ExitingHASHRecords
ExitingHASHRecords select(mapColumn(
		EXISTING_PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY = PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY,
		EXISTING_PARTICIPANT_ID = ExistingDIM@PARTICIPANT_ID,
		EXISTING_VERSION_NO = ExistingDIM@VERSION_NO,
		EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
		EXISTING_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectExiting
SourceHASHRecords, SelectExiting exists(SOURCE_HASH_RECORD == EXISTING_RECORD_HASH,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, SelectExiting lookup(UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID == EXISTING_UNIQUE_PARTICIPANT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(EXISTING_PARTICIPANT_ID),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRecords, UpdatedRecords)
ConditionalSplit1@NewRecords keyGenerate(output(NEW_PARTICIPANT_ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1, ExistingDimMAX join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinMaxID
JoinMaxID derive(NEW_PARTICIPANT_ID = MAX_VAL+NEW_PARTICIPANT_ID,
		VERSION_NO = 1,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH = toInteger(YEAR_OF_BIRTH),
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo
RunInfo alterRow(insertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
ConditionalSplit1@UpdatedRecords derive(VERSION_NO = EXISTING_VERSION_NO+1,
		BATCH_ID = 1,
		CREATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		UPDATED_BY = FILE_NAME,
		DATE_CREATED = currentDate(),
		DATE_UPDATED = currentDate()) ~> RunInfo2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PARTICIPANT_ID as integer,
		VERSION_NO as integer,
		EMAIL as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		GENDER as string,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH as integer,
		NATIONALITY as string,
		JOB_TITLE as string,
		ADDRESS as string,
		ID as string,
		USERNAME as string,
		HOWLONG as string,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE as string,
		SALUTATION as string,
		CITY_NAME as string,
		POBOX as string,
		POST_CODE as string,
		SKYPE as string,
		AIM as string,
		YAHOO as string,
		MSN as string,
		CITY_REGION as string,
		OTHER_INFORMATION as string,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS as string,
		OTHER_EMAILS as string,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA as string,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE as string,
		CONFIDENTIAL as string,
		PHONE_NUMBER as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		VERSION_NO,
		EMAIL,
		LAST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		GENDER,
		YEAR_OF_BIRTH = RunInfo@YEAR_OF_BIRTH,
		NATIONALITY,
		JOB_TITLE,
		ADDRESS,
		ID,
		USERNAME,
		HOWLONG,
		PRIOR_EXPERIENCE,
		SALUTATION,
		CITY_NAME,
		POBOX,
		POST_CODE,
		SKYPE,
		AIM,
		YAHOO,
		MSN,
		CITY_REGION,
		OTHER_INFORMATION,
		OTHER_PHONE_NUMBERS,
		OTHER_EMAILS,
		SOCIAL_MEDIA,
		PREFERRED_LANGUAGE,
		CONFIDENTIAL,
		PHONE_NUMBER = {PHONE NUMBER},
		BATCH_ID,
		SOURCE,
		CREATED_BY,
		UPDATED_BY,
		DATE_CREATED,
		DATE_UPDATED
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> iDIMPARTICIPANT

source(output(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of event} as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,

		{First name} as string,
		Gender as string,

		{Date of birth} as string,
		Country as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		Size as string,

		{Office Address} as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		Website as string,

		{Country of Residence} as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Region as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Title as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,

		{Type of platform} as string,
		{SheTrades Project} as string,
		ISIC as string,
		{Please select the area of your activity} as string,
		HS as string,
		{Owner/ top manager gender} as string,
		{Owner/ top manager age} as string,
		{Type of training} as string,
		{Service theme 1} as string,
		{Service theme 2} as string,
		Location as string,
		{Name of the entity} as string,
		{ISIC code division} as string,
		{HS 6 digit code (if available)} as string,
		{Account Name} as string,
		{English Name} as string,
		Acronym as string,
		{Account Type} as string,
		{Account Sub-Type} as string,
		{Office Address: Country} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Parent Account} as string,
		Confidential as string,
		Activity as string,
		Product as string,
		{Women Managed} as string,
		{Youth Managed} as string,
		{Social media} as string,
		{Other emails} as string,
		{Other phone numbers} as string,
		{Other information} as string,
		{Ownership and management} as string,
		{Trade Forum} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Office Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Office Address: City} as string,
		{Office Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Office Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing address is equal to office address} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 1} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Street 2} as string,
		{Mailing Address: City} as string,
		{Mailing Address: State/Province} as string,
		{Mailing Address: ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Mailing Address: Country} as string,
		{UN Mailing Format} as string,
		{Project Number} as string,
		Salutation as string,
		Account as string,
		Phone as string,
		{Preferred Language} as string,
		{Use account address} as string,
		{Event title} as string,
		{Event type} as string,
		{Course name} as string,
		{Start date} as string,
		{End date} as string,
		{Event date} as string,
		{SME Trade Academy} as string,
		SheTrades as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SrcAll
source(output(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY as integer,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		PROJECT_TITLE as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMPROJECT
source(output(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE
source(output(
		EVENT_TYPE_SR_KEY as integer,
		EVENT_TYPE_CODE as string,
		EVENT_TYPE_DESC as string,
		BATCH_ID as integer,
		SOURCE as string,
		CREATED_BY as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		DATE_CREATED as timestamp,
		DATE_UPDATED as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DIMEVENTTYPE

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',

source(output(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY as integer,

	),

source(output(
		DATE_SR_KEY as integer,
		DATE_TIME as date,

		CALENDER_MONTH_NAME as string,
		CALENDER_MONTH_ID as integer,

DIMPROJECT select(mapColumn(
		PROJECT_SR_KEY,
		PROJECT_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMPROJECT01
DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE select(mapColumn(
		CONTEXT_SUB_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE01
DIMEVENTTYPE select(mapColumn(
		EVENT_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		EVENT_TYPE_CODE,
		EVENT_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMEVENTTYPE01
SelectReqCol derive(ProjectID = case(isNull(ProjectID)==false(),
     ProjectID,
     isNull({Project Number})==false(),
     {Project Number},
     'N/A'),
		{Type of event} = case(isNull({Type of event})==false(),
     {Type of event},
     isNull({Event type})==false(),
     {Event type},
     instr(FILE_NAME, 'Contact') > 0 && trim({Event type})=='ITC-Corporate',
     'ITC corporate event',
     'N/A'),
		{Type of platform} = case(isNull({Type of platform})==false(),
     {Type of platform},
     isNull({Type of tool})==false(),
     {Type of tool},
     instr(FILE_NAME, 'Contact') > 0 && isNull(SheTrades)==false(),
     'SheTrades',
     instr(FILE_NAME, 'Contact') > 0 && isNull({SME Trade Academy})==false(),
     'SME Trade Academy',
     'N/A'),
		PARTICIPANT_ID = case(isNull(Email)==false(),
     Email,
     concat({First name}, {Last name},Gender,{Year of birth})
     ),
		{Date of data collection New} = case(isNull({Date of data collection})==false(),
     {Date of data collection},
     isNull({Registration Date})==false(),          
{Registration Date},
     ''),
		{Submission Date} = toDate({Submission Date},'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss')) ~> DerivedFACTCol
SrcAll select(mapColumn(
		ProjectID,
		Context,
		{Project Number},
		{Event type},
		{Type of event},
		{Type of training},
		{Type of platform},
		{Type of tool},
		SheTrades,
		{SME Trade Academy},
		FILE_NAME,
		Email,
		{First name},
		{Last name},
		Gender,
		{Year of birth},
		{Date of data collection},
		{Registration Date},
		{Submission Date}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqCol
DerivedFACTCol, DIMPROJECT01 lookup(upper(trim(ProjectID)) == upper(trim(PROJECT_ID)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpPROJECT
LkpPROJECT, DIMCONTEXTSUBTYPE01 lookup(upper(trim(Context)) == upper(trim(CONTEXT_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpCONTEXT
LkpCONTEXT, DIMEVENTTYPE01 lookup(upper(trim({Type of event})) == upper(trim(EVENT_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpEVENTTYPE
DIMTRAININGTYPE select(mapColumn(
		TRAINING_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		TRAINING_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMTRAININGTYPE01
LkpEVENTTYPE, DIMTRAININGTYPE01 lookup(upper(trim({Type of training})) == upper(trim(TRAINING_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpTRAININGTYPE
DIMPLATFORMTYPE select(mapColumn(
		PLATFORM_TYPE_SR_KEY,
		PLATFORM_TYPE_DESC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMPLATFORMTYPE01
LkpTRAININGTYPE, DIMPLATFORMTYPE01 lookup(upper(trim({Type of platform})) == upper(trim(PLATFORM_TYPE_DESC)),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpPLATFORMTYPE
DIMPARTICIPANT01 aggregate(groupBy(PARTICIPANT_ID),
	VERSION_NO = max(VERSION_NO)) ~> LatestVersionPARTICIPANT
DIMPARTICIPANT, LatestVersionPARTICIPANT join(DIMPARTICIPANT@PARTICIPANT_ID == LatestVersionPARTICIPANT@PARTICIPANT_ID
	&& DIMPARTICIPANT@VERSION_NO == LatestVersionPARTICIPANT@VERSION_NO,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(PARTICIPANT_ID = case(isNull(EMAIL)==false(),
     EMAIL,
     concat(FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME,GENDER,toString(YEAR_OF_BIRTH))
     )) ~> DIMPARTICIPANTID
LkpPLATFORMTYPE, DIMPARTICIPANTSelect lookup(DerivedFACTCol@PARTICIPANT_ID == DIMPARTICIPANTSelect@PARTICIPANT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpPARTICIPANT
DIMDATE01 select(mapColumn(
		DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DATECOLLECTIONDATE
LkpPARTICIPANT, DATECOLLECTIONDATE lookup({Date of data collection New} == toString(DATE_TIME, 'MM/dd/YYYY'),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpDATECOLLECTIONDATE
DIMDATE02 select(mapColumn(
		DATE_SR_KEY,
		DATE_TIME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DATESUBMISSON
LkpDATECOLLECTIONDATE, DATESUBMISSON lookup({Submission Date} == DATESUBMISSON@DATE_TIME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LkpDATESUBMISSON
DIMPARTICIPANTID select(mapColumn(
		PARTICIPANT_SR_KEY,
		PARTICIPANT_ID,
		VERSION_NO = LatestVersionPARTICIPANT@VERSION_NO
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DIMPARTICIPANTSelect
LkpDATESUBMISSON sink(input(
		{ProjectID|Context|FirmID|Date of data collection|Country|interviewkey|interviewid|A01|A02|A03|A04|A06|A07|A09|A10|A11|A12|A13|B01|B03|B17|BA03|BA04|BA07|BA08|BA11|BA12|BA13|BA14|BA15|BB02|BB08|BB09|BC03|BC04|C04|C05|DA01|DB01|DB02|DB03|FILE_NAME|LOAD_TIMESTAMP} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
